A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: i'm not going to say that I'm an expert critic. But this movie was a complete let down. From the start of the movie it was very obvious that this movie was going in a completely different direction than the last movie. Maybe it was because of having Ryan Johnson work on it rather than JJ Abrams. Almost felt like both of these guys had completely different visions for Star Wars. The quote \"Let the past die\, kill it if you have to\" is taken literally in this movie.
